lead_paragraph: Ms. del Castillo, a Mexican television star, is believed to have brokered the meeting between the drug lord, Joaquín Guzmán Loera, and Mr. Penn last year.
snippet: Ms. del Castillo, a Mexican television star, is believed to have brokered the meeting between the drug lord, Joaquín Guzmán Loera, and Mr. Penn last year.

headline.main: Kate del Castillo, Actress Tied to ‘El Chapo,’ Set Up Sean Penn Meeting
headline.print_headline: The Interview: The Actress and the Ethics

abstract: Rambling account by actor Sean Penn in Rolling Stone magazine about his interview with Mexican drug lord Joaquin Guzman Loera points to integral role played by Mexican television star; Kate del Castillo had met previously with Guzman, who admired her performance in television series La Reina del Sur, in which she played drug lord; their personal contact increased after his 2014 capture, and he had indicated he wanted her to produce film about his life.
